root: ^What do you mean the Beholderite wasn’t in their stomach?
^Get out of my face. If you come back empty handed again, you’re going in the pit.
^Well well well, if it isn't the lovely folks that gave me the compass.
^Wait a minute, he has my enchanted axe. It was a gift from my father... It is no wonder who is behind all this.
^And that is my family's amulet! It will amplify our attacks with the power of harmony!

Netrixi_speaks_to_Kaz: ^You took our compass. Either you give it back, or I'll do it for you.
^Ooooo there's some fire in your soul! You don't see much of that anymore. What is your name?
Not_give_compass: ^Give me the Compass or I'll turn you into a toad!
^Too hot-headed for manners huh? So be it. Prepare to die.
Name_is_Netrixi: ^My name is Netrixi! Witch and alchemist of Beholderite. I have killed countless men. One more is nothing to me.
^I like you. Maybe we can arrange something. You work for me in my labs, and I will give you your things
Netrixi_fight_Kaz: ^You think you can fool me?! I know you're lying, Netrixi. Bad mistake. Assassins!
Evade_Kaz_slave: ^We shall see about that. Run your arrands and return back to me, Netrixi. Heed my words, or I will find you myself.
^I'd rather just be done with you now
Evade_Kaz: ^Good. Here are your things. Oh, and bring these back as well. After you betray your friends, I mean.
Folkvar_speaks_to_Kaz: ^Well hello! We happened to be in the area and figured that we could pick up what you borrowed from us!
Iv_speaks_to_Kaz: ^I am looking for my brother. I know you all didn't take him, but we need the power to take him back.
Iv_pursuades_Kaz: ^I sense deep sorrow in your heart. I know you've lost before - much more than I could know.
^You're right. I have lost. I assume this amulet is yours?
Iv_pursuades_Kaz_again: ^I never knew my mother... Here, take your amulet. And here are the rest of your things. Now leave.
Fight_nice_Kaz: ^I am not kind! I was raised as a monster and that is who I am. You never should have come here.
